requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you encounter problems running the game, please make sure SteamVR is set as your default OpenXR runtime. Here's how: SteamVR => Settings => Developer => Set as default OpenXR Runtime (set as default OpenXR Runtime button is only available if it is not set to default already) If SteamVR is not set as default, the game might not launch in the HMD and button hints might not be shown in the tutorial.
